ARABIC: أَوْ نُرِيَنَّكَ ٱلَّذِى وَعَدْنَٰهُمْ فَإِنَّا عَلَيْهِم مُّقْتَدِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: or let you see what We have promised them. They are completely in Our power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or show you some of what We have promised them. They are certainly well within Our power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: or make you see the end that We had promised them, for We have full power over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: or show them to you suffering the torment with which We had threatened them. We are certainly dominant over them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Or show you what We have promised them – We therefore have complete control over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or (if) We show you that wherewith We threaten them, then verily, We have perfect command over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Rather We will certainly show you that which We have promised them; for surely We are the possessors of full power over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: or We show thee a part of that We promised them, surely We have power over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or (if) We show thee that wherewith We threaten them; for lo! We have complete command of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: or We shall show you what We have promised them; for surely We have complete power over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Or if We shew thee that wherewith We threaten them, verily We are going to prevail over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: or show you what We have promised them, for indeed We hold them in Our power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or We shall show thee that (accomplished) which We have promised them: for verily We shall prevail over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or (if) We show you that wherewith We threaten them, then verily, We have perfect command over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: or We show you a part of that which We have promised them, for indeed We have power over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or show you what We have promised them; for We have absolute power over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or whether [or not] We show you that which We have promised them, indeed, We are Perfect in Ability.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:42] or We show you, during your lifetime, that which We have promised them, in the way of chastisement, for surely We have power over, [surely] We are able to chastise, them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or (if) We show thee that wherewith We threaten them) on the Day of Badr; (for lo! We have complete command of them) We are able to punish them before your death and after it.
